means: [汽]普锐斯,丰田汽车公司生产的一款混合动力车

sentence.Network_en: Modern gas - electric hybrids such as the Toyota Prius exist in part because of bureaucrats.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府干预也是丰田普瑞斯(Prius)等油电混合动力车出现的原因之一.

sentence.Network_en: Toyota's Prius car is still short supply, the purchase must queue.
sentence.Network_cn: 丰田的普锐斯车依然供不应求, 购买的人必须排队等候.

sentence.Network_en: The Matrix offers more cargo capacity than the Prius, for a lower price.
sentence.Network_cn: 矩阵提供了更多的货运能力比普锐斯, 对于以较低的价格.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pritzel 普里策尔, prius 混合动力, pritzker 普里茨克
